content: I had no single goal. I mostly just wanted to do it for fun, and I justified the time I put into it by saying it was worth the learning experience (which is probably true). It does have some cool syntax constructs that aren't in any major languages, and now that it has come so far, its looking plausible that it could continue to grow. Anyone using it for anything serious is still a very long way off and sum what improbable.
